pages.text: The day and the night cycle run for 12 minutes each, leading to a day+night cycle of 24 minutes.  The lighting at night is affected by the moon cycles and weather so take note and don't venture out if its too dark to see.
With more task to do and increased difficulty, expect a longer technology cycle and learning curve.  You may have to be happy merely with collecting the most basic of tools on your first night.
